episodes.title: Episode 49 - Lapidary and Angel's Landing
episodes.description: Embark on a journey through time and minerals in our latest episode on lapidary arts. Join us as we uncover the ancient craft of shaping and polishing stones, exploring the mesmerizing world of gemstones, and the skillful hands that turn rough rocks into stunning works of art. Then, unveil the chilling narrative of the Angel's Landing cult in this gripping episode, where we navigate through the dark corridors of a mysterious group that captivated followers with promises of reincarnation. Explore the psychological dynamics, the leader, and the haunting events that unfolded, as we unravel the unsettling story behind the Angel's Landing cult.
